<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/interactive-host"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;Utility for testing InteractiveModelRunner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">Use it from pass-specific tests by providing a main .py which calls this library&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#96;run&#95;interactive&#96; with an appropriate callback to provide advice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">From .ll tests, just call the above-mentioned main as a prefix to the opt/llc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">invocation (with the appropriate flags enabling the interactive mode)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">Examples:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">    make&#95;response: Callable&#91;&#91;List&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/log-reader/tensorvalue">log&#95;reader.TensorValue</a>&#93;&#93;, Union&#91;int, float&#93;&#93;,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;&quot;Host the compiler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    Args:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      temp&#95;rootname: the base file name from which to construct the 2 pipes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      communicating with the compiler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      make&#95;response: a function that, given the current tensor values, provides a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      response.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      process&#95;and&#95;args: the full commandline for the compiler. It it assumed it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      contains a flag poiting to &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96; so that the InteractiveModeRunner</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">      would attempt communication on the same pair as this function opens.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    This function sets up the communication with the compiler - via 2 files named</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96;.in and &#96;temp&#95;rootname&#96;.out - prints out the received features,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    and sends back to the compiler an advice (which it gets from &#96;make&#95;response&#96;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    It&#39;s used for testing, and also to showcase how to set up communication in an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    interactive ML (&quot;gym&quot;) environment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">    &quot;&quot;&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    to&#95;compiler = temp&#95;rootname + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.in&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">    from&#95;compiler = temp&#95;rootname + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.out&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">try</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">        os.mkfifo(to&#95;compiler, 0o666)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">        os.mkfifo(from&#95;compiler, 0o666)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">        compiler&#95;proc = subprocess.Popen(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">            process&#95;and&#95;args, stderr=subprocess.PIPE, stdout=subprocess.DEVNULL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">        )</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">with</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> io.BufferedWriter(io.FileIO(to&#95;compiler, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;wb&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">as</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">with</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> io.BufferedReader(io.FileIO(from&#95;compiler, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;rb&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">as</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">                tensor&#95;specs, &#95;, advice&#95;spec = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/log-reader/#ab40242c357e077a78fbfb8fd4a61cf90">log&#95;reader.read&#95;header</a>(fc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">                context = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">None</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    next&#95;event = fc.readline()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">not</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> next&#95;event:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    (</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        observation&#95;id,</span></CodeLine>
